queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers</b>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C3</p> <p>15. C3, C7</p> <p>15. C2</p>', '1.1', '<p>IFRS 15 is applied using one of the following two methods: </p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>The “retrospective” method: apply the Standard retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, subject to the expedients in paragraph IFRS 15.C5; or</li> <li>The “cumulative effect” method: retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 15 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the annual reporting period that includes the date of initial application. The entity may elect to apply IFRS 15 retrospectively only to contracts that are not completed contracts at the date of initial application.</li> </ol> <p><i>For the purposes of the transition requirements: </i></p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li><i></i>the date of initial application is the start of the reporting period in which an entity first applies this Standard (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end);</li> <li><i>a completed contract is a contract for which the entity has transferred all of the goods or services identified in accordance with IAS 11 Construction Contracts, IAS 18 Revenue and related Interpretations.</i></li> </ol> <b>Confirm here which transition method is being used: </b><br> <b>Retrospective method / Cumulative effect method </b> <p>Have the appropriate sections of the checklist below been completed? </p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>Transition to IFRS 15 using the “Retrospective” method</b>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C3</p> <p>IAS</p> <p>IAS 8.22</p>', '2.1', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the adjustments made to the opening balance of each affected component of equity for the earliest prior period presented and the other comparative amounts disclosed for each prior period presented as if IFRS 15 had always been applied?</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C3</p> <p>IAS</p> <p>IAS 8.28</p>', '2.2', '<p>When the initial application of IFRS 15 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>The title of the IFRS;</li> <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li> <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</li> <li>For the immediately prior period presented, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the statement of cash flows); NB 1</li> <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ol> <p><i><b>NB 1</b>: Notwithstanding the requirements of paragraph 28 of IAS 8, when IFRS 15 is first applied (using the Retrospective method) an entity need only present the quantitative information required by paragraph 28(f) of IAS 8 for the annual period immediately preceding the first annual period for which this Standard is applied. An entity may also present this information for the current period or for earlier comparative periods, but is not required to do so.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C5, C6</p>', '2.3', '<p>When applying IFRS 15 using the Retrospective method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 15. C5.</p> <p>Has the entity disclosed the following in respect of any practical expedients used on transition:</p> <ul> <li>The expedients that have been used; and</li> <li>To the extent reasonably possible, a qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of applying each of those expedients?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Transition to IFRS 15 using the “Cumulative effect” method</b>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C8</p>', '3.1', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the following:</p> <ul> <li>the amount by which each financial statement line item is affected in the current reporting period by the application of this Standard as compared to IAS 11, IAS 18 and related Interpretations that were in effect before the change; and</li> <li>an explanation of the reasons for significant changes identified above?</li> </ul> <p><i>This disclosure is only required to be given for the reporting period that includes the date of initial application (i.e. the 31 December 2018 reporting period where 1 January 2018 is the date of initial application). </i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C7A, C6</p>', '3.2', '<p>When applying IFRS 15 using the Cumulative effect method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 15. C7A.</p> <p>Has the entity disclosed the following in respect of any practical expedients used on transition:</p> <ul> <li>The expedients that have been used; and</li> <li>To the extent reasonably possible, a qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of applying each of those expedients?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>IFRS 9 Financial Instruments</b>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>9. 7.2.1</p>', '', '<p>On transition, IFRS 9 is applied retrospectively in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, expect as specified in IFRS 9.7.2.4 to 7.2.26 and 7.2.28. However, IFRS 9 is not applied to items that have already been derecognised at the date of initial application (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end). </p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>9. 7.2.15</p>', '', '<p>Prior periods do not need to be restated; the entity can choose to restate prior periods if, and only if, it is possible without the use of hindsight. However, the transition disclosures as set out in IFRS 7.42L to 42O will still be required. If prior periods are not restated, the difference between the previous carrying amount and the carrying amount at the date of initial application is recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the reporting period that includes the date of initial application.</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>9. 7.2.2</p>', '', '<p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve one or more than one date of initial application for different requirements (e.g. if an entity has early adopted the requirement for the presentation of gains and losses on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss).</p> <p>IFRS 9 itself does not contain any disclosure requirements; it is a Standard which changes the classification and measurement of financial instruments. IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures deals with the disclosure requirements. </p> <p>Paragraphs 42I to 42S of IFRS 7 set out the disclosure requirements of initial application of IFRS 9. </p> <p>Key to abbreviations used in this checklist:</p> <p>FVTPL = Fair value through profit or loss</p> <p>FVOCI = Fair value through other comprehensive income</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42I</p>', '4.1', '<p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9 (which will likely just be the current reporting period), has the entity disclosed the following information for each class of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application:</p> <ul> <li>the original measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IAS 39 or in accordance with a previous version of IFRS 9 (if the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9 involves more than one date of initial application for different requirements);</li> <li>the new measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the amount of any financial assets and financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, distinguishing between those that IFRS 9 requires an entity to reclassify and those that an entity elects to reclassify at the date of initial application?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42J</p>', '4.2', '<p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9, has sufficient qualitative disclosure been given to enable users to understand:</p> <ul> <li>how it applied the classification requirements in IFRS 9 to those financial assets whose classification has changed as a result of applying IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the reasons for any designation or de-designation of financial assets or financial liabilities as measured at fair value through profit or loss at the date of initial application?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42J</p>', '4.3', '<p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve more than one date of initial application (as per the introductory narrative).</p> <p>If the entity has more than one date of initial application, have the disclosures above in 4.1 and 4.2 been given for each date of initial application?</p> <i><p>NB: the entity shall present disclosures from 4.1 in a table unless another format is more appropriate.</p></i>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42L</p>', '4.4', '<p>Has disclosure been given of the changes in the classifications of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application of IFRS 9, showing separately:</p> <ul> <li>the changes in the carrying amounts on the basis of their measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 (i.e. not resulting from a change in </li> <li>measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9); and the changes in the carrying amounts arising from a change in measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42M</p>', '4.5', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the following for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost and, in the case of financial assets, that have been reclassified out of FVTPL so that they are measured at FVOCI, as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p> <ul> <li>the fair value of the financial assets or financial liabilities at the end of the reporting period; and</li> <li>the fair value gain or loss that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income during the reporting period if the financial assets or financial liabilities had not been reclassified?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42N</p>', '4.6', '<p>Has the following been disclosed for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of the FVTPL category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p> <ul> <li>the effective interest rate determined on the date of initial application; and</li> <li>the interest revenue or expense recognised?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: If an entity treats the fair value of a financial asset or a financial liability as the new gross carrying amount at the date of initial application (see paragraph 7.2.11 of IFRS 9), the disclosures in this paragraph shall be made for each reporting period until derecognition. Otherwise, the disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42O</p>', '4.7', '<p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p> <ul> <li>the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the class of financial instrument</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42P</p>', '4.8', '<p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p> <p><i> For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42R</p>', '4.7', '<p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p> <ul> <li> the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li> <li> the class of financial instrument</li> </ul> <p>as at the date of initial application?</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 7.42S</p>', '4.8', '<p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p> <p><i>For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42R</p>', '4.9', '<p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p> <p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42S</p>', '4.10', '<p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p> <p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

C3, C7</p> <p>15. C2</p>', '1.1', '<p>IFRS 15 is applied using one of the following two methods: </p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>The “retrospective” method: apply the Standard retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, subject to the expedients in paragraph IFRS 15.C5; or</li> <li>The “cumulative effect” method: retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 15 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the annual reporting period that includes the date of initial application. The entity may elect to apply IFRS 15 retrospectively only to contracts that are not completed contracts at the date of initial application.</li> </ol> <p><i>For the purposes of the transition requirements: </i></p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li><i></i>the date of initial application is the start of the reporting period in which an entity first applies this Standard (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end);</li> <li><i>a completed contract is a contract for which the entity has transferred all of the goods or services identified in accordance with IAS 11 Construction Contracts, IAS 18 Revenue and related Interpretations.</i></li> </ol> <b>Confirm here which transition method is being used: </b><br> <b>Retrospective method / Cumulative effect method </b> <p>Have the appropriate sections of the checklist below been completed? </p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

C3</p> <p>IAS</p> <p>IAS 8.28</p>', '2.2', '<p>When the initial application of IFRS 15 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>The title of the IFRS;</li> <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li> <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</li> <li>For the immediately prior period presented, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the statement of cash flows); NB 1</li> <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ol> <p><i><b>NB 1</b>: Notwithstanding the requirements of paragraph 28 of IAS 8, when IFRS 15 is first applied (using the Retrospective method) an entity need only present the quantitative information required by paragraph 28(f) of IAS 8 for the annual period immediately preceding the first annual period for which this Standard is applied. An entity may also present this information for the current period or for earlier comparative periods, but is not required to do so.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C8</p>', '3.1', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the following:</p> <ul> <li>the amount by which each financial statement line item is affected in the current reporting period by the application of this Standard as compared to IAS 11, IAS 18 and related Interpretations that were in effect before the change; and</li> <li>an explanation of the reasons for significant changes identified above?</li> </ul> <p><i>This disclosure is only required to be given for the reporting period that includes the date of initial application (i.e. the 31 December 2018 reporting period where 1 January 2018 is the date of initial application). </i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C7A, C6</p>', '3.2', '<p>When applying IFRS 15 using the Cumulative effect method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 15. C7A.</p> <p>Has the entity disclosed the following in respect of any practical expedients used on transition:</p> <ul> <li>The expedients that have been used; and</li> <li>To the extent reasonably possible, a qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of applying each of those expedients?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>IFRS 9 Financial Instruments</b>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>9. 7.2.1</p>', '', '<p>On transition, IFRS 9 is applied retrospectively in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, expect as specified in IFRS 9.7.2.4 to 7.2.26 and 7.2.28. However, IFRS 9 is not applied to items that have already been derecognised at the date of initial application (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end). </p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>9. 7.2.15</p>', '', '<p>Prior periods do not need to be restated; the entity can choose to restate prior periods if, and only if, it is possible without the use of hindsight. However, the transition disclosures as set out in IFRS 7.42L to 42O will still be required. If prior periods are not restated, the difference between the previous carrying amount and the carrying amount at the date of initial application is recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the reporting period that includes the date of initial application.</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>9. 7.2.2</p>', '', '<p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve one or more than one date of initial application for different requirements (e.g. if an entity has early adopted the requirement for the presentation of gains and losses on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss).</p> <p>IFRS 9 itself does not contain any disclosure requirements; it is a Standard which changes the classification and measurement of financial instruments. IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures deals with the disclosure requirements. </p> <p>Paragraphs 42I to 42S of IFRS 7 set out the disclosure requirements of initial application of IFRS 9. </p> <p>Key to abbreviations used in this checklist:</p> <p>FVTPL = Fair value through profit or loss</p> <p>FVOCI = Fair value through other comprehensive income</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42I</p>', '4.1', '<p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9 (which will likely just be the current reporting period), has the entity disclosed the following information for each class of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application:</p> <ul> <li>the original measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IAS 39 or in accordance with a previous version of IFRS 9 (if the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9 involves more than one date of initial application for different requirements);</li> <li>the new measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the amount of any financial assets and financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, distinguishing between those that IFRS 9 requires an entity to reclassify and those that an entity elects to reclassify at the date of initial application?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42J</p>', '4.2', '<p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9, has sufficient qualitative disclosure been given to enable users to understand:</p> <ul> <li>how it applied the classification requirements in IFRS 9 to those financial assets whose classification has changed as a result of applying IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the reasons for any designation or de-designation of financial assets or financial liabilities as measured at fair value through profit or loss at the date of initial application?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42J</p>', '4.3', '<p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve more than one date of initial application (as per the introductory narrative).</p> <p>If the entity has more than one date of initial application, have the disclosures above in 4.1 and 4.2 been given for each date of initial application?</p> <i><p>NB: the entity shall present disclosures from 4.1 in a table unless another format is more appropriate.</p></i>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42L</p>', '4.4', '<p>Has disclosure been given of the changes in the classifications of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application of IFRS 9, showing separately:</p> <ul> <li>the changes in the carrying amounts on the basis of their measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 (i.e. not resulting from a change in </li> <li>measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9); and the changes in the carrying amounts arising from a change in measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42M</p>', '4.5', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the following for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost and, in the case of financial assets, that have been reclassified out of FVTPL so that they are measured at FVOCI, as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p> <ul> <li>the fair value of the financial assets or financial liabilities at the end of the reporting period; and</li> <li>the fair value gain or loss that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income during the reporting period if the financial assets or financial liabilities had not been reclassified?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42N</p>', '4.6', '<p>Has the following been disclosed for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of the FVTPL category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p> <ul> <li>the effective interest rate determined on the date of initial application; and</li> <li>the interest revenue or expense recognised?</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: If an entity treats the fair value of a financial asset or a financial liability as the new gross carrying amount at the date of initial application (see paragraph 7.2.11 of IFRS 9), the disclosures in this paragraph shall be made for each reporting period until derecognition. Otherwise, the disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42O</p>', '4.7', '<p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p> <ul> <li>the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li> <li>the class of financial instrument</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42P</p>', '4.8', '<p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p> <p><i> For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42R</p>', '4.7', '<p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p> <ul> <li> the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li> <li> the class of financial instrument</li> </ul> <p>as at the date of initial application?</p>', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 7.42S</p>', '4.8', '<p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p> <p><i>For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42R</p>', '4.9', '<p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p> <p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>7. 42S</p>', '4.10', '<p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p> <p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4g', '3.15.7 Ab4g', '66', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:45:02')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <b>IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers</b>
    [1] => <p>IFRS 15 is applied using one of the following two methods: </p>
<ol type="a">
    <li>The “retrospective” method: apply the Standard retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, subject to the expedients in paragraph IFRS 15.C5; or</li>
    <li>The “cumulative effect” method: retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 15 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the annual reporting period that includes the date of initial application. The entity may elect to apply IFRS 15 retrospectively only to contracts that are not completed contracts at the date of initial application.</li>
</ol>
<p><i>For the purposes of the transition requirements: </i></p>
<ol type="a">
    <li><i></i>the date of initial application is the start of the reporting period in which an entity first applies this Standard (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end);</li>
    <li><i>a completed contract is a contract for which the entity has transferred all of the goods or services identified in accordance with IAS 11 Construction Contracts, IAS 18 Revenue and related Interpretations.</i></li>
</ol>
<b>Confirm here which transition method is being used: </b><br>
<b>Retrospective method / Cumulative effect method </b>
<p>Have the appropriate sections of the checklist below been completed? </p>
    [2] => <b>Transition to IFRS 15 using the “Retrospective” method</b>
    [3] => <p>Has the entity disclosed the adjustments made to the opening balance of each affected component of equity for the earliest prior period presented and the other comparative amounts disclosed for each prior period presented as if IFRS 15 had always been applied?</p>
    [4] => <p>When the initial application of IFRS 15 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p>
<ol type="a">
    <li>The title of the IFRS;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li>
    <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</li>
    <li>For the immediately prior period presented, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the statement of cash flows); NB 1</li>
    <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li>
    <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li>
</ol>
<p><i><b>NB 1</b>: Notwithstanding the requirements of paragraph 28 of IAS 8, when IFRS 15 is first applied (using the Retrospective method) an entity need only present the quantitative information required by paragraph 28(f) of IAS 8 for the annual period immediately preceding the first annual period for which this Standard is applied. An entity may also present this information for the current period or for earlier comparative periods, but is not required to do so.</i></p>
    [5] => <p>When applying IFRS 15 using the Retrospective method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 15. C5.</p>
<p>Has the entity disclosed the following in respect of any practical expedients used on transition:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The expedients that have been used; and</li>
    <li>To the extent reasonably possible, a qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of applying each of those expedients?</li>
</ul>
    [6] => <b>Transition to IFRS 15 using the “Cumulative effect” method</b>
    [7] => <p>Has the entity disclosed the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the amount by which each financial statement line item is affected in the current reporting period by the application of this Standard as compared to IAS 11, IAS 18 and related Interpretations that were in effect before the change; and</li>
    <li>an explanation of the reasons for significant changes identified above?</li>
</ul>
<p><i>This disclosure is only required to be given for the reporting period that includes the date of initial application (i.e. the 31 December 2018 reporting period where 1 January 2018 is the date of initial application). </i></p>
    [8] => <p>When applying IFRS 15 using the Cumulative effect method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 15. C7A.</p>
<p>Has the entity disclosed the following in respect of any practical expedients used on transition:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The expedients that have been used; and</li>
    <li>To the extent reasonably possible, a qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of applying each of those expedients?</li>
</ul>
    [9] => <b>IFRS 9 Financial Instruments</b>
    [10] => <p>On transition, IFRS 9 is applied retrospectively in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, expect as specified in IFRS 9.7.2.4 to 7.2.26 and 7.2.28. However, IFRS 9 is not applied to items that have already been derecognised at the date of initial application (i.e. 1 January 2018 for a 31 December 2018 year end). </p>
    [11] => <p>Prior periods do not need to be restated; the entity can choose to restate prior periods if, and only if, it is possible without the use of hindsight.  However, the transition disclosures as set out in IFRS 7.42L to 42O will still be required. If prior periods are not restated, the difference between the previous carrying amount and the carrying amount at the date of initial application is recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the reporting period that includes the date of initial application.</p>
    [12] => <p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve one or more than one date of initial application for different requirements (e.g. if an entity has early adopted the requirement for the presentation of gains and losses on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss).</p>
<p>IFRS 9 itself does not contain any disclosure requirements; it is a Standard which changes the classification and measurement of financial instruments. IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures deals with the disclosure requirements. </p>
<p>Paragraphs 42I to 42S of IFRS 7 set out the disclosure requirements of initial application of IFRS 9. </p>
<p>Key to abbreviations used in this checklist:</p>
<p>FVTPL = Fair value through profit or loss</p>
<p>FVOCI = Fair value through other comprehensive income</p>
    [13] => <p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9 (which will likely just be the current reporting period), has the entity disclosed the following information for each class of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the original measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IAS 39 or in accordance with a previous version of IFRS 9 (if the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9 involves more than one date of initial application for different requirements);</li>
    <li>the new measurement category and carrying amount determined in accordance with IFRS 9; and</li>
    <li>the amount of any financial assets and financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, distinguishing between those that IFRS 9 requires an entity to reclassify and those that an entity elects to reclassify at the date of initial application?</li>
</ul>
    [14] => <p>In the reporting period that includes the date of initial application of IFRS 9, has sufficient qualitative disclosure been given to enable users to understand:</p>
<ul>
    <li>how it applied the classification requirements in IFRS 9 to those financial assets whose classification has changed as a result of applying IFRS 9; and</li>
    <li>the reasons for any designation or de-designation of financial assets or financial liabilities as measured at fair value through profit or loss at the date of initial application?</li>
</ul>
    [15] => <p>Depending on the entity’s chosen approach to applying IFRS 9, the transition can involve more than one date of initial application (as per the introductory narrative).</p>
<p>If the entity has more than one date of initial application, have the disclosures above in 4.1 and 4.2 been given for each date of initial application?</p>
<i><p>NB: the entity shall present disclosures from 4.1 in a table unless another format is more appropriate.</p></i>
    [16] => <p>Has disclosure been given of the changes in the classifications of financial assets and financial liabilities as at the date of initial application of IFRS 9, showing separately:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the changes in the carrying amounts on the basis of their measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 (i.e. not resulting from a change in </li>
    <li>measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9); and the changes in the carrying amounts arising from a change in measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9?</li>
</ul>
<p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>
    [17] => <p>Has the entity disclosed the following for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost and, in the case of financial assets, that have been reclassified out of FVTPL so that they are measured at FVOCI, as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the fair value of the financial assets or financial liabilities at the end of the reporting period; and</li>
    <li>the fair value gain or loss that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income during the reporting period if the financial assets or financial liabilities had not been reclassified?</li>
</ul>
<p><i>NB: The disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>
    [18] => <p>Has the following been disclosed for financial assets and financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of the FVTPL category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the effective interest rate determined on the date of initial application; and</li>
    <li>the interest revenue or expense recognised?</li>
</ul>
<p><i>NB: If an entity treats the fair value of a financial asset or a financial liability as the new gross carrying amount at the date of initial application (see paragraph 7.2.11 of IFRS 9), the disclosures in this paragraph shall be made for each reporting period until derecognition. Otherwise, the disclosures in this paragraph need not be made after the annual reporting period in which the entity initially applies the classification and measurement requirements for financial assets in IFRS 9.</i></p>

    [19] => <p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p>
<ul>
    <li>the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li>
    <li>the class of financial instrument</li>
</ul>
    [20] => <p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p>
<p><i> For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p>

    [21] => <p>Do the disclosures given in 4.5 and 4.6 above, as well as the disclosures required by paragraph 25 of this IFRS, permit a reconciliation between:</p>
<ul>
    <li>	the measurement categories presented in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9; and</li>
    <li>	the class of financial instrument</li>
</ul>
<p>as at the date of initial application?</p>
    [22] => <p>As at the date of initial application of Section 5.5 of IFRS 9 (Impairment), has information been disclosed that permits the reconciliation of the ending impairment allowances in accordance with IAS 39 and the provisions in accordance with IAS 37 to the opening loss allowances determined in accordance with IFRS 9?</p>
<p><i>For financial assets, this disclosure shall be provided by the related financial assets’ measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 and IFRS 9, and shall show separately the effect of the changes in the measurement category on the loss allowance at that date.</i></p>

    [23] => <p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p>
<p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p>

    [24] => <p>In accordance with paragraph 7.2.4 of IFRS 9, if it is impracticable at the date of initial application of IFRS 9 for an entity to assess a modified time value of money element based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset, an entity shall assess the contractual cash flow characteristics of that financial asset based on the facts and circumstances that existed at the initial recognition of the financial asset without taking into account the requirements related to the modification of the time value of money element in paragraphs B4.1.9B–B4.1.9D of IFRS 9. </p>
<p>In these circumstances, has disclosure been given of the carrying amount at the reporting date of those financial assets until those financial assets are derecognised?</p>
